On the day of experiment collect spleen and lymph nodes from CD8+OT-1 TCR transgenic mice and make single cell suspensions. Pool cells and count
Keep cells at 2 X 10<sup>7</sup> /ml in complete media for primary splenic cultures.
Wash SAMBOK APCs in PBS once to get rid of any residual media and IFN-g.
Place 1 mL of cells onto SAMBOK APCs and culture for 48 hours. Ensure that the media does not become too yellow. It is best to place an additional 1ml of media in each well after 24 hours.

Pool all cells in and spin down in a 50 mL conical and resuspend in complete media for primary splenic cultures supplemented with 200 U/ml of IL-2 at 2 X 10<sup>7</sup>/ml.  Allow these cells to sit for an additional 48 hours in a 24 well plate \(1ml/well).
After 48 hours take some cells for FACs analysis to check purity of the population should be > 95% CD8 T cells.
